Identify daycare workers over the age of 60 with serious chronic medical Cassandra Hernandez conditions and assign them to areas with minimal exposure to visitors and District 4 attendees. Rodriguez o shortness of breath. District 7 Any symptomatic staff or attendee should be dismissed until they are fever Henry Rivera free without medications for >24 hrs and have no cough. District 8 Isolate any symptomatic attendee until picked-up by parent. Cissy Lizarraga . Attendance should be prohibited to any staff/attendee who: o Is a confirmed case of COVID-19 until cleared by City of El Paso Department of Public Health CITY MANAGER Tommy Gonzalez o In the previous 14 days has had contact with someone with a confirmed diagnosis of COVID-19; o is under investigation for COVID-19; or o In the previous 14 days has travelled internationally to countries with widespread, sustained community transmission. Daycare Operations: No more than 20 attendees per room will be allowed at the same time. . Lunches should be programmed and staggered to prevent crowding in lunchroom.
